summary: Provides utilities to adapt torchvision backbone and Feature Pyramid Network code for N‑dimensional (2D/3D) medical imaging, defining custom convolution and pooling layers and a wrapper that combines a backbone network with an FPN to produce multi‑scale feature maps.
business_intent: Facilitates building detection or segmentation models in the MONAI framework that require multi‑scale feature extraction from ResNet‑based backbones across 2D and 3D data, improving performance on medical imaging tasks.
